item.title: Kevin Loaec, Antoine Poinsot - Revault (2020-04-24)
item.description: Name: Kevin Loaec and Antoine Poinsot Topic: Revault Bitcoin vaults Location: Honey Badger Diaries (podcast) Date: April 24th 2020 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDTCT75VwvU Transcript (abridged) Aaron: So you guys built something. First tell me are you a company? Is this a startup? What is the story here? Kevin: My personal interest in vaults started last year when Bryan Bishop published his email on the mailing list. I was like “That is an interesting concept.
